description: The physical location of an organization. A Person (i.e. employee) would typically has a relationship to a Site (i.e. located_at or work_at). Also used as the abstract reference to AWS Regions.

location.description: The address/location of the site. Or an AWS Region (e.g. us-east-2).

secured.description: Indicates the site is secured with physical controls such as key card access and surveillance cameras.

restricted.description: Indicates that access to the site is restricted (a level above secured access).
